name: Pinball vs Block！Falling Balls
description:
Time to challenge your skills and IQ now!


• Aim to get the highest score before the bricks touch the line.
• Move your finger and find the most accurate angle to shoot.
• Predict, analyze and shoot at the right time.
• Shoot as many balls as you can to get the superior bricks with special effect.
• Eliminate your biggest threaten with the superior bricks to score high!
• Collect various cool balls and try out all the different effects now!


Endless Pinballs with endless challenges!
Believe or not, you'll be the next Pinball Master!
Come download and challenge your friends right now!
